require(knitr)

test table

```{r sms, echo = FALSE}
source("smsdata.r")
sms.data <- sms
counts <- sms.data %>% 
  group_by(URNO, SMS_Month, SMS_Year) %>%
  tidyr::drop_na(URNO)

glimpse(counts)

counts2 <- aggregate(sms.data["URNO"], by=sms.data[c("SMS_Month","SMS_Year")], FUN=length)

DT::datatable(counts2)
```

```{r plot, echo = FALSE}
counts3 <- as.ts(counts2$URNO, frequency=12, start = c(2012, 12), calendar = TRUE)
plot.ts(counts3)

ggplot2::coun
```
